title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 167-2.11 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 167-2.11 - Penalties

State Regulations
(a) Failure to
comply with this Subpart may be grounds for disciplinary action. (b) Sections
205.20
and
205.25
of the

Penal Law make promotion, introduction, making and obtaining of contraband
illegal. If contraband is introduced into the facility, the facility director
shall contact the Director of Labor Relations and disciplinary action may be
taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
167-2.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
